component.name: NickTV
component.script:
sub init() videocontent = createObject("RoSGNode", "ContentNode")
videocontent.title = "You're watching Nick TV" videocontent.streamformat = "mp4" videocontent.url = "http://192.168.1.3:8000/nick.mp4" videocontent.playstart = 0
video = m.top.findNode("nowPlaying") video.content = videocontent
video.enableUI = false video.setFocus(true) video.control = "play" end sub
